stimulusHtml:
You are writing an article for the student newspaper of your sister school in Japan. Write an article in which you compare and contrast indoor activities and outdoor activities. Based on your personal experience, describe at least THREE aspects of each and highlight the similarities and differences between indoor activities and outdoor activities. Also, state your preference and give reasons for it. Type your response in the target language.

Your article should be 300 to 400 characters or longer. Use the desu/masu or da (plain) style, but use one style consistently. Also, use kanji wherever kanji from the AP Japanese kanji list is appropriate.
